title: Bug 41039 - Hitting the Enter/Return key in the Find/Replace dialog doesn't do anything on Mac OS X
description: Hitting the Enter/Return key in the Find/Replace dialog doesn't perform the expected action on Mac OS X.
OB: When the Find/Replace dialog is open on Mac OS X 10.2.6, typing a search term into the text box and hitting the return key does not initiate a 'Find' operation.
EB: Hitting the Return key should initiate a 'Find' operation, equivalent to clicking on the 'Find' button.
SR:
To reproduce: 1) Open the Find/Replace dialog (Edit -> Find/Replace).
2) Type a search term into the text box.
3) Hit the return key.
Expected: The software should perform a 'Find' operation.
